DOC.brief_summary: Aim : The aim project identify chronic low back pain patients´ belief origin mean pain develop biopsychosocial web-based educational intervention . The aim project assess effectiveness web-based educational intervention chronic low back pain patient pain cognition , pain intensity , disability . Methods : Mixed method design , combine qualitative quantitative methodology . For qualitative part study , investigator use qualitative in-depth semi-structured interview . For quantitative phase use experimental study design . Subjects : Chronic low back pain patient 18-65 year old , attend primary care set city Lleida . Expected outcome : The investigator expect change modify chronic low back pain patients´ cognition use web-site educational intervention , outcome reduce pain disability .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Biopsychosocial Educational Internet-based Intervention Chronic Low Back Pain Patients : A Mixed Methods Approach
DOC.detailed_description: Hypothesis outcomes Hypothesis : 1 . Persistent chronic low back pain consequence maintain lack understanding origin mean pain . 2 . Pain neurophysiology educational internet- base intervention chronic low back pain change cognition origin mean pain , outcome pain reduction , disability reduction , good quality life compare normal care . Outcomes : There specific objective phase study . Phase 1 ( QUAL ) : To identify chronic low back pain patient ' belief concern origin mean pain . Phase 2 ( Connecting procedure ) : To construct develop biopsychosocial web- base educational intervention use QUAL result . Phase 2 ( QUAN ) : Primary outcome . To evaluate effect biopsychosocial web-based educational intervention chronic low back pain base pain intensity compare normal care . Secondary outcome . To assess effect biopsychosocial web-based educational intervention chronic low back pain compare normal care : - Fear avoidance belief . Kinesiophobia . - Pain catastrophizing . Disability . - Quality life . Methodology Study design To answer research question , author use mixed-method sequential exploratory design . The pur- pose mixed methodology replace qualitative quantitative methodology , use strengths reduce weakness . Specific- ally , sequential exploratory design include initial qualitative phase follow quantitative phase , aim develop educational tool . In project , propose phase ( qualitative quantitative ) must relevance ( QUAL- QUAN ) development educational tool development study must conduct three stage : 1 . Qualitative data collection semi-structured personal interview follow thematic analysis . 2 . Construction educational tool result obtain previous step ( topic emerge category ) . 3 . Analysis effectiveness educational tool use randomize controlled trial . Scope : Primary care SUBJECTS : The recruitment process perform independently phase study , although phase recruitment process take place pri- mary care center city Lleida family physician . The inclusion exclusion criterion also common phase . Prior begin first phase , first author study perform presentation project medical nursing staff primary care center involve study ask cooperation . QUAL : In phase , patient recruit respective family physician . Once physician make diagnosis CLBP ensure individual meet inclusion exclusion criterion , physician informs patient existence project invite contact first author telephone . If person agree participate study , inter- view schedule take place Faculty Nursing Physiotherapy University Lleida . QUAN : The recruitment process start end QUAL development educational tool . This phase consist educational interven- tion use randomize controlled trial design . The re- cruitment process QUAL . Prior begin intervention , first author meet study subject individually inform study condition provide inform consent form .
DOC.criteria: 1 . History CLBP longer 6 month . 2 . Patients 1865 year old . 3 . To able read , speak understand Spanish , Catalan , English . 4 . With access Internet , computer laptop email address . 5 . To accept sign informed consent . 1 . Any red flag condition : Onset age < 20 > 55 year Nonmechanical pain ( unrelated time activity ) Thoracic pain Previous history carcinoma , steroid , HIV Feeling unwell Weight loss Widespread neurological symptom Structural spinal deformity
